title: Manager | Dance Academy (Salsa / Bachata)
job_overview:
Management experience required!

Full-time, long-term opportunity.

Apply ONLY if your written English skills are strong. (If you're struggling with written English, other roles will fit you better).


SCHEDULE
• Sunday - Thursday 9am-6pm PST (Los Angeles time)
• Occasionally (maybe just once per 2-3 months) you may be asked to also be available during flexible hours, such as the mornings PST on a Saturday. Some flexibility is needed.


ABOUT US
We are the largest salsa & bachata dance academy in Los Angeles and are always expanding.

Busy times!

The culture here is FUN and friendly. Our goal is to make every student feel welcome and completely taken care of all the time.

Dancing changes lives - we are on a mission to deliver the best salsa/bachata educational experience on Earth.

The company is Movers and Shakers Salsa and Bachata Dance Academy.



YOUR ROLE
• Creative a positive, fun, healthy, supportive working culture for the team
• Learn all current systems & SOP's for the company
• Manage the remote team (currently includes approximately 8 people, who cover all facets of the business)
• Choose KPI's for yourself and everyone else
• Measure results
• Coach teaUpgrade to see actual infombers (1 on 1 video calls etc.)
• Do formal evaluations with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
• Making hiring/firing suggestions to business owner
• Propose projects to the business owner
• Delegate roles for new projects
• Identify the highest impact activities and prioritize accordingly
• Write new SOP's as we grow and evolve
• Communicate progress, challenges etc. to the business owner on a daily basis


ABOUT YOU
• Management experience
• Perfect written English
• Comfortable telling owner the REAL story. Ex. Who's doing well? Who's not?
• Natural leader
• Available full-time
• High emotional intelligence
• Flexible
• Quick learner
• Desire to always seek better ways to do things
• Happy to be on the phone when needed (which is rarely)
• Tremendous attention to detail - gets things right the first time
• PRO-ACTIVE. Always looking for ways to improve.
• Meticulous, organized, methodical. Almost never misses a detail.
• Critical, creative thinker. Not robotic. Always looking for better ways to do things. Always considering all the angles of a task.
• Not afraid to share your opinion - we NEED to hear your opinion on the approaches that we take so that we can improve.
• Able to ask clarifying questions in order to get tasks right the first time
• Strong communicator
• Makes decisions independently
• Quick learner
• Fast computer
• Fast, dependable Internet
• Bonus if you have experience or interest in salsa or bachata or any dance!


APPLY NOW. FORMAT YOUR APPLICATION AS A NUMBERED LIST WITH THE FOLLOWING:
1. A brief intro about your management experience. Include dates, # of employees in company, # of teaUpgrade to see actual infombers you managed, nature of the role

2. Can you work the hours requested?

3. Any computer coding capabilities? If so, what languages? (Not required. Just curious.)

4. Complete this form: Upgrade to see actual info/Upgrade to see actual info. Write in the subject line of your application: 1. Grammar score 2. Typing WPM 3. Numbers assessment answer (regarding achieving $2,000 profit) 4. Highest level of education and name of degree

6. These positions are competitive, often with hundreds of applicants. What is your competitive requested monthly payment for this full-time position?


(Don't email me off the platform or message on social media - your application will be disqualified. Don't worry, I personally check every application here)

Looking forward to meeting you!
